metricapp.service.repository

Class BusRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • metricapp.service.repository.BusRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusInterface

    @Service
public class BusRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements BusInterface
    This repository is the lowest level before the connection with Bus Rest Interface. Method in this class are almost the same described in Bus Team Documentation on their Bus.

    • Method Detail

      • rawPost

        private java.lang.String rawPost(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> content)
                          throws BusException
        lowest level method to interact with bus, it requires only the type of request and the content. there's no "null check"
        Parameters:
        content - Array with 3 elements, it contains the phase number, the request (read, update, delete, rollback) and the content string
        Returns:
        the String content sended by the Bus. Tipically it is in JSON syntax, but it can contain Error String
        Throws:
        BusException

      • fillContent

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fillContent(java.lang.String field0,
                                                java.lang.String field1,
                                                PointerBus field2)
                                                   throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Simple function to create and fill the content array. field2 is converted to string with JacksonMapper
        Parameters:
        field0 - identifies the phase number, typically it's fixed
        field1 - identifies the kind of the request
        field2 - identifies the request
        Returns:
        the filled array of elements
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        See Also:
        JacksonMapper

      • read

        public java.lang.String read(PointerBus pointerBus)
                      throws BusException,
                             com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        this method permits to interact with the bus through a read request. There's no null parameters check.
        Specified by:
        read in interface BusInterface
        Parameters:
        pointerBus -
        Returns:
        the content of the response, it's a String in Json Syntax typically and needs to be converted
        Throws:
        BusException - if available append the previous exception to the last one
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the dto is not printable like json
